edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.configuration
Class BitstreamGenerator

java.lang.Object
  edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.configuration.BitstreamGenerator
Direct Known Subclasses:
V4BitstreamGenerator, V5BitstreamGenerator, V6BitstreamGenerator
public abstract class BitstreamGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

Generates a valid bitstream object from configured FPGA objects. This abstract class is architecture independent and contains abstract classes that need to be defined for extending, architecture specific classes. The architecture specific abstract methods defined in this class include the following: getEndingFARAddress createInitialBitstream createEndingBitstream

createFullBitstream

public Bitstream createFullBitstream(FPGA fpga,
                                     BitstreamHeader header)
Creates a full bitstream from an FPGA object. TODO: Create a method that creates the header

Parameters:
fpga - The configured FPGA object that contains the data going into the bitstream.
header - A preinitialized header object that will go into the full bitstream.

addFDRIWriteCommandFromConsecutiveFrames

protected void addFDRIWriteCommandFromConsecutiveFrames(PacketListCRC packets,
                                                        java.util.List<Frame> frames)
                                                 throws BitstreamException
Creates a a set of Packets to perform a write of configuration data. This is based on a set of sequential Frames in the FPGA object.

Throws:
BitstreamException

addFDRIWritePackets

protected static PacketListCRC addFDRIWritePackets(PacketListCRC packets,
                                                   int farAddress,
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> data)
                                            throws BitstreamException
Creates and adds a set of Packets to perform a write of configuration data. The data is sequential Frame data. This is common among all three architectures (V4, V5, and V6)

Throws:
BitstreamException

createPartialBitstream

public Bitstream createPartialBitstream(FPGA fpga,
                                        BitstreamHeader header,
                                        int farAddress)
This method is based on Ben Sellers original Bitstream.CreateBRAMPartialBody method. This original method has been divided into three parts: 1) createInitialPartialBitstream V4: NOP, RCRC, NOPx2, IDCODE, WCFG, NOP 2) GetPartialWritePackets(crc, BRAM_CONTENT_ADDRESS) 3) createEndingPartialBitstream V4: LFRM, NOPx101, CRC, DESYNC, NOP

createPartialBitstream

public Bitstream createPartialBitstream(FPGA fpga,
                                        BitstreamHeader header)

createPartialBRAMBitstream

public Bitstream createPartialBRAMBitstream(FPGA fpga,
                                            BitstreamHeader header)

getPartialWritePacketsBenSellers

public PacketListCRC getPartialWritePacketsBenSellers(PacketListCRC packetList,
                                                      FPGA fpga,
                                                      int farAddr)
This is a method that creates partial write packets and is based exclusively off of Ben Sellers Bitstream.GetPartialWritePackets method. This is not the best way to handle this but it is added for backwards compatibility.

createInitialFullBitstream

public abstract PacketListCRC createInitialFullBitstream(int idcode)
Creates the initial list of packets that are necessary for full bitstreams. These packets are those that occur BEFORE the actual configuration data. Different architectures have different preconfig data packets.

createEndingFullBitstream

public abstract PacketListCRC createEndingFullBitstream(PacketListCRC packets,
                                                        XilinxConfigurationSpecification spec)
Creates the ending list of packets that are necessary for full bitstreams. These packets are those that occur AFTER the actual configuration data. Different architectures have different post configuration data packets.

createInitialPartialBitstream

public abstract PacketListCRC createInitialPartialBitstream(int idcode)
Creates the initial list of packets that are necessary for partial bitstreams. The initial list of packets for a partial bitstream are different than those for a full bitstream.

createEndingPartialBitstream

public abstract PacketListCRC createEndingPartialBitstream(PacketListCRC packets)
Creates the ending list of packets that are necessary for partial bitstreams. The ending list of packets for a partial bitstream are different than those for a full bitstream.

                                                throws BitstreamException

BitstreamException

writeBitstreamToBIT

public static int writeBitstreamToBIT(Bitstream bit,
                                      java.lang.String outputFilename)
Helper class for generating a .bit file from a Bitstream.

createPartialWritePackets

public static PacketListCRC createPartialWritePackets(PacketListCRC packets,
                                                      XilinxConfigurationSpecification spec,
                                                      int farAddress,
                                                      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> data)
                                               throws BitstreamException
This method is based on the method Bitstream.GetPartialWritePackets written by Ben Sellers. It creates a set of packets to configure a partial bitstream. This method will add two frames of zeros at the end.

Throws:
BitstreamException
